inclusion.criterion: Stable glycaemic control with HbA1c ≥48 (6.5%) and ≤86 mmol/mol (10%)
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Insulin treatment according to basal-bolus regimen, i.e. by multiple daily injections at least four times daily, or by subcutaneous insulin pump, for at least 12 months,
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Insulin requirement of <34 or >200 units per day
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Treatment with systemic corticosteroids, immunosuppressive or cytostatic drugs
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Use of oral antidiabetic drugs other than metformin
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of a major cardiovascular disease event (myocardial infarction, stroke, symptomatic peripheral artery disease, coronary bypass surgery, percutaneous coronary or peripheral artery angioplasty) in the previous 6 months
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Pregnancy or the intention to become pregnant
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has had type 1 diabetes for 11 years, currently homeless and lost insulin supply. Has been on basal-bolus regimen with insulin glargine and aspart.
